dataObjects.bibliographicCitation: Moelants, T. 2010. Ctenopoma weeksii. In: IUCN 2014 . IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Version 2014.1 . <www.iucnredlist.org>
dataObjects.description: Ctenopoma weeksii is known from Pool Malebo (Stanley Pool) and the Central Congo River basin, including the Wagenia Falls (Stanley Falls).
